name: Gorth
description:
Gameplay:

Gorth is a fast-paced game where you must sacrifice different food items that spawn randomly around the map to a big hole in the middle named “Gorth”. Gorth’s minion will tell you what Gorth wants to eat. whether is sugar, meat or vegetable. Please listen carefully cause there is no U.I. displaying what Gorth wants.

We were a team of 3, a Sound Designer + Graphic, graphic+animations and a Programmer+Game Designer. Please note this is our first Ludum dare so we do not expect something amazing out of the results…

Controls:

left + right arrows = movement

up arrow = jump

F = pickup item

space = throw item

Music Used: GAS GAS GAS - Manuel (8 bit edition)

Tools:

Engine: Unity 2018

Sound Design: Audacity + GXSCC

IDE: Visual Studio 2017 Community

Graphic design: Aseprite + Photoshop

OS: Windows
